name: Beat Jumper
description:
Beat Jumper - A game made for the  FireTruck Game Jam.

Using only two controls, A and B, jump and slash your way through the garden to the rhythm of the different tracks.

A to jump, B to attack.
Frogs require A then B.

In the menu, A to move your selection, B to select.

Libraries used:
https://github.com/finnkuusisto/TinySound

Songs:

"Airship Serenity", "Cut and Dry", "Doobly Doo", "EDM Detection Mode", "Furious Freak", "Mega Hyper Ultrastorm" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
